author: Judy L
title: Perfect location, great hotel!
text:
We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square for it's location and price after reading the reviews. I am so happy that I did. The location is great for theater, restaurants and close to Rockefeller Center, Central Park and Times Square. We stayed in a corner room, room 1231. I was concerned about noise being close to Times Square but it was quiet with a view, The front desk staff were helpful with all our questions as we stayed 3 nights. I asked for a late checkout as we were running late and they obliged. Only negative comment is room could have more lighting and the pillows were a little too squishy but this is very minor. The lobby is beautiful with a business center and small store. The wifi is free and did not cut out and the elevators were quick. I would definitely stay here again.
